definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: The business of owning and operating a dairy or a dairy farm.
sentences.chinese: 乳品業擁有和經營乳品公司或乳牛場的商業。

sentences.english: Marchy doesn't plan to resume the life of a dairyman.
sentences.chinese: 李英不想再繼續他的乳牛場主生涯。

sentences.english: We have lots of dairy herds, dairy cows.
sentences.chinese: 我們擁有許多乳牛羣和奶牛。

sentences.english: She always got a cow, but a different breed every year.
sentences.chinese: 她總是塑造乳牛，但每年的乳牛品種都不一樣。

sentences.english: She always got a cow, but a different breed every year.
sentences.chinese: 她總是塑造乳牛，但每年的乳牛品種都不一樣。

sentences.english: The Hopkinses run the biggest dairy farm in the state of Arizona.
sentences.chinese: 霍布金斯家族經營利桑那州最大的乳牛場。

sentences.english: The dairy farm owns over 200 dairy cattle.
sentences.chinese: 這個牧場擁有超過兩百隻的乳牛。

sentences.english: The cows circled round the farmer who was bringing their food.
sentences.chinese: 乳牛圍繞着給它們送來食物的農場主。

sentences.english: The cows are milking well this season.
I saw a black and white cow.
sentences.chinese: 我看見一頭黑白花乳牛。

sentences.english: As a fresh dairy product , it has a limited shelf-life.
sentences.chinese: 一如新鮮的乳牛產品，它的生命是有期限的。

sentences.english: On Tuesday morning Jack went and hired himself to a dairyman.
sentences.chinese: 星期二早上，傑克去爲一名乳牛場主幹活。

sentences.english: After his cow had enough to drink, he started to take her to a grassy field.
sentences.chinese: 乳牛喝足了水後，他便牽着它到牧草場喫草。

definition: Angus, Scottish breed of beef cattle
to give birth (animals)/to bear a litter
